thread.title: BRIEF-KBRwyle Awarded $34.1M To Help Air Force With Air Traffic Safety And Cyber Threats

title: BRIEF-KBRwyle Awarded $34.1M To Help Air Force With Air Traffic Safety And Cyber Threats

organizations.name: to help air force with air
to help air force with air tr

text: March 19, 2018 / 11:02 AM / in 11 minutes BRIEF-KBRwyle Awarded $34.1M To Help Air Force With Air Traffic Safety And Cyber Threats Reuters Staff March 19 (Reuters) - KBR Inc: * KBRWYLE AWARDED $34.1M TO HELP AIR FORCE WITH AIR TRAFFIC SAFETY AND CYBER THREATS * KBR INC - UNIT KBRWYLE WILL PRIMARILY PERFORM WORK AT WRIGHT PATTERSON AIR FORCE BASE IN OHIO AND WARNER ROBINS AIR FORCE BASE IN GEORGIA * KBR INC - ‍ TASK ORDER AWARD PERIOD IS 54 MONTHS​ * KBR INC - REVENUE ASSOCIATED WITH CONTRACT AWARD WILL BE BOOKED INTO BACKLOG OF UNFILLED ORDERS FOR KBR’S GOVERNMENT SERVICES BUSINESS SEGMENT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
